user_data.target_needs: The main need I wanted to fulfill was comfort and support in everyday wear, particularly in undergarments.
purchase_reason: The primary reason for purchasing this product was the expectation of comfort and a secure fit. However, the experience was disappointing as the product did not meet these expectations, leading to strong negative feelings towards it.

The decision to purchase this item was driven by the desire for comfort and quality. The product's description highlighted features such as a soft waistband and premium cotton material, which aligned with my needs for all-day wear. The positive reviews and the reasonable price also influenced my decision.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that are durable, functional, and comfortable. I value high-quality materials and craftsmanship, as well as features that enhance usability, such as moisture-wicking properties and secure fits. I appreciate items that offer a good balance of style and practicality, making them suitable for everyday use. Additionally, I tend to favor products that provide a perfect fit and are designed to last, as evidenced by my positive experiences with various clothing and accessories. On the other hand, I dislike products that are poorly made, lack durability, or do not meet my comfort expectations, particularly in clothing items like socks and underwear.

conversation.content: I want to find comfortable and supportive undergarments for everyday wear. within my expected price range: [20.99, 25.54]
What specific style of undergarments are you looking for?
I need ["Clothing Shoes & Jewelry", "Men", "Clothing", "Underwear", "Boxer Briefs"] category products.
What material do you prefer for your boxer briefs, such as cotton, modal, or a blend of fabrics?
I prefer boxer briefs made of premium cotton material for comfort and breathability throughout the day.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <ZLYC Mens Long Leg Cotton Boxer Briefs Fit Underwear, 3/4 Pack> / Item ID: B079L3M5NM / Price: $22.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Underwear', 'Boxer Briefs'] / Description: ['This mens boxer briefs will keep you comfortable all day long. Made of 95% premium combed cotton, comfy, breathable, softer and stronger than standard cotton. It has wide elastic waistband that offers a comfortable fit in every situation. Tag free and no ride ups are always a must. Plus, the contour pouch gives your stuff the support it needs and cosy room. Order now and enjoy the comfort of this classic!', 'Material', ': 95% Cotton and 5% Elastan', 'Size', ': Tag M=32-34 Inches Tag L=36-38 Inches Tag XL=40-42 Inches', 'Washing Instruction', ': 1. Machine wash warm with like colors2. Use only non-chlorine bleach when needed.3. Tumble dry medium.4. Cool iron if needed.', 'Satisfaction Guarantee', ': If any problem, please feel free to contact us and we will work hard towards your 100% satisfaction (new replacements or refund)'] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Hanes Men's Boxer Briefs, Cotton Stretch Moisture-Wicking Underwear, 6-Pack> / Item ID: B0C6JDX8V5 / Price: $24.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Underwear', 'Boxer Briefs'] / Description: ["This men's boxer briefs multipack is made from soft and breathable stretch cotton that moves with you, thanks to our Cool Comfort® fabric. Our experts designed them with a Comfort Flex® waistband that flexes and moves with you. Each pair of boxer brief underwear has a no-ride-up design, so they'll stay put no matter what your day holds. Plus, you can throw them right in the washer when they need a quick refresh. And our favorite feature part of all? These men's black boxer brief underwear sets have different waistband colors and also come in multiple size options, from Small to extended sizes like 3XL, so you can choose the one that works best for you."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Hanes Mens Tagless Boxer Briefs with ComfortSoft Waistband 4-Pack> / Item ID: B0BGNWCS7F / Price: $15.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Underwear', 'Boxer Briefs'] / Description: ['As soft as your favorite tee. Comfortable for EVERY day wear.']
